text: Elizabeth Ann Reaser (born 15 June 1975) is an American actress. She played Esme Cullen in the Twilight movies. She also played Rebecca Pope/Ava in Grey's Anatomy in the 2007â€“2008 season. Reaser was born in Bloomfield, Michigan. ==References== Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Michigan Category:1975 births Category:Living people
